subject: Preferred Audi Software
author: Shane
full_text:

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

I have Audacity, wavepad, and Cool Edit Pro.

Someone also mentioned Goldweave to me.

Cool Edit Pro is what I've been using with a mix of Audacity for one particular feature.

As far as ease of use and result what do you use recommend?

Some of the attachments you guys put up are crystal clear .. compared to mine ( hope to get the hang of it with the right software).

here are some I just recently did. perhaps some pointers you don't have to give me all your secrets heh.

Thanks in advance,
Shane
